name: VR Uphill Extreme OffRoad Truck Simulator
name_original: VR Uphill Extreme OffRoad Truck Simulator
description:
Winter season is here and you have been hired as the uphill cargo truck driver to complete transportation tasks in extreme weather conditions. Uphill extreme truck driver is one of the most realistic driving simulators with off road adventure. Cargo truck through mountains and snow is one of the most realistic truck driving games. It’s not easy to drive heavy duty cargo truck over uphill mountains. Start the off-road cargo driving and experience the thrill of driving extreme cargo truck in this uphill cargo truck driving game.

In Up Hill Cargo Truck Driver game your goal is to drive your own off-road cargo truck. Drive carefully your cargo extreme truck without dropping load to the end point and deliver it within time on the required destination. You will drive an off road cargo truck to carry the oil and water barrels, relief fund boxes and other goods through the steep paths of mountains. Steep Paths are difficult to drive but you have to handle with care & show perfect driving skill. Have you ever tried to drive heavy cargo transport truck? Try it playing Uphill Extreme Truck Driver!


Uphill Extreme Truck Driver is the awesome transport simulator with dangerous mountains and twisted roads filled with snow driving experience. Extreme weather will make your drive a difficult one, but that’s what makes you a heavy truck driver. Get in your vehicle and drive cargo truck to your destination. You will enjoy attractive mountains, steep roads, treacherous turns and snow all the way while driving. Your truck is load with heavy products oil and water drums, relief funds and other goods so avoid driving it with high speed. Up Hill Cargo Truck Simulator Driver game is best for those who like driving games with heavy vehicles

GAMEPLAY FEATURES
• Off Road Truck Driving Adventure
• Easy game play & Realistic Drive
• Smooth and Realistic controls
• Transport Woods, Logs, Relief and Barrels
• Amazing Snowfall & Hills Environment
• Real Experience of Up Hill Cargo Truck Driving
• Thrill of Driving on Hills through Dangerous Mountains
• Multiple Weather Conditions with Day & Night Modes
